thread.section_title: Le Relais Montmartre - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic hotel, good location, super friendly staff
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel, good location, super friendly staff - Review of Le Relais Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MortenCB
title: Fantastic hotel, good location, super friendly staff
text:
We went on a 4 night romantic holiday, and chose this hotel because of the reviews it had gotten. We were not let down! We were greeted by super-friendly staff and the room was very nice. The location is just a couple of minutes from the Metro.
The area is a bit shady - in the middle of the "red district". Moulin Rouge is 1 minute from the hotel, and the street Moulin Rouge is on contains probably a hundre sex shops. But if you go just a mnute or two in any direction from the main street, the area has lots and lots of super-cozy cafees, restaurants, bars and so on. Many of them are some of the highest ranked on Tripadvisor.
We would definately come back to this hotel if we went back to Paris.
